item.title: Website Design: Part 2
item.description: This post continues the work from the previous one. This code takes the saved data and creates the images.

item.title: Website Design: Part 1
item.description: This blog post and the next one cover the code for making the site images. The first post pulls the data, and the second one creates the images. The setup first pulls the contents from the Data Science page of Wikipedia to get the letter frequencies. The code then pulls the overall letter frequencies for the English language. Finally, it saves them together to graph later.
